content: Any idea how one of the CI builders just randomly ended with Error: The operation was canceled.? https://github.com/rust-lang-ci/rust/runs/3343208673
last time i saw that, there was a problem with the cancellation script that cancels the run when the branch has been pushed to after the run started, but that was on rust-lang PRs, not rust-lang-ci

GitHub announced today that macOS 11 is now generally available. I wouldn't be surprised if they shut down machines to divert to that pool, which could appear as "cancelled". Overall, the macos machines can be a little flaky.
